channel.title: About Me on
channel.description: Recent content in About Me on

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World One of my goals for 2023 is to start a professional site/blog as I continue my journey as Software Developer. The main goal of this blog is to do more learning in public and to share what I learn with the people who find this blog. WhoAmI My name is Ryan Monaghan I’m currently a software engineer who primarily focuses on C#. I’ve been a software developer for about 3 years and before that, I taught High School Computer Science.
